3  using System;
4  using System.Globalization;
5  using System.Windows;

7  /// <inheritdoc/>
8  /// <summary>
9  /// A converter that takes in a boolean if a message was sent by me ( <see
10  /// cref="Fasetto.Word.Core.ChatMessageListItemViewModel.SentByMe"/>), and returns the correct
11  /// background color
12  /// </summary>
13  public class SentByMeToBackgroundConverter : BaseValueConverter<SentByMeToBackgroundConverter>
14  {
15  #region Public Methods
16 
17  /// <inheritdoc/>
18  /// <summary>
19  /// Convert a boolean to a static resource of either WordVeryLightBlueBrush or ForegroundLightBrush
20  /// </summary>
21  /// <param name="value">The boolean to evaluate</param>
22  /// <param name="targetType">The type to convert to</param>
23  /// <param name="parameter">Any parameters passed</param>
24  /// <param name="culture">The language culture</param>
25  /// <returns>The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Visibility"/>. value</returns>
26  public override object Convert(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)
27  {
28  return (bool)value ? Application.Current.FindResource("WordVeryLightBlueBrush") : Application.Current.FindResource("ForegroundLightBrush");
29  }
30 
31  /// <inheritdoc/>
32  /// <summary>
33  /// Not used
34  /// </summary>
35  /// <param name="value">The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Visibility"/> value</param>
36  /// <param name="targetType">The TargetType of the action to target</param>
37  /// <param name="parameter">Any parameters passed</param>
38  /// <param name="culture">The language culture</param>
39  /// <returns>The <see cref="T:System.Boolean"/> value of this property</returns>
40  /// <exception cref="T:System.NotImplementedException">
41  /// We have not implemented this (yet)
42  /// </exception>
43  public override object ConvertBack(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)
44  {
45  throw new NotImplementedException();
46  }
